description:
Iroha grieves about the battles that have been fought so far and figures she couldn’t save anyone in the end.
Kyubey thanks Iroha and says that her hope caused everyone to fall into despair.
The despair of Magical Girls is what Kyubey has been seeking all along.
All the while, Iroha’s Doppel continues tormenting her.
As a result of Iroha’s interference with the Magius, more Witches will be born.
On the brink of despair, Iroha hears a familiar voice call out to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dare mo Shiranai, Watashitachi no Kiroku
誰も知らない, 私たちの記録
